Portland.Silverado (gay bar):
Silverado, formerly known as Flossie's, is a gay bar and strip club in Portland, Oregon, United States.


== Description and history ==
Silverado, Portland's only gay strip club, after the closure of Three Sisters Tavern in 2004 and prior to Stag PDX's opening in 2015, has existed for nearly 30 years. Formerly called Flossie's, it was originally located below a gay bathhouse in what is now the Crystal Hotel.
